trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> class is used to supply event values to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> classe é usada para fornecer valores de evento para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos e permitem que você especifique uma identidade personalizada para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> usando atual do objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> e o transmite para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade durante o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, a identidade fornecida pelo tíquete de autenticação de formulários no cookie ou URL é usada.

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento só é gerado quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> e o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object with a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> objeto com um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: O contexto para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the supplied `context` as the value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> objeto usando fornecido `context` como o valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Ele passa a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> o objeto para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> fornece acesso a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objetos para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> a ser associado à solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> objeto a ser associado à solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade durante o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, a identidade fornecida pelo tíquete de autenticação de formulários no cookie ou URL é usada.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object with a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> objeto com um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
